body.p:
To his Excellency Thomas E. Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky

Dear sir we your petitioners citizens of Trigg County would respectfully suggest that whereas one Joel Coalmon of our county, was charged with having commited a felony in the county some two or three years since and afterwards Joined the federal army and died and his bond for his appearance in the Trigg Circuit Court was forfeited and whereas Alfred Francis his security is a Poor man and has a large family and has two sons in the federal army all the help he had so that he can not pay said Bond without impoverishing his family now Therefore we Pray that said Fine or so much thereof as is due the commonwealth be remited and we will ever Pray

N. Joiner
Johnathan Pryor
Richard Knight Jr
Richard Howard
Richard Knight Sr.
John Shelton
W. G. Davenport
Wm Pryor Jr
Isaac Joiner
R Ths Tinsley
Thomas S. Legate
J. H. knightJ. W. Legate
Gomedian C Scott
W. E. Reynolds
John Lacey
Richard Knight Jr.
W. L Stephens
Mr Govern Bramlet gentle Sir you will ansswer this petchen as quick as pos a ble and oblisdge yours by Dr Rect Letters to Layfayette Christian Co the nearest post office Alfred Frances

Trigg Cir Ct

Alfred Frances
